Package aufgabe4

Klasse Noten

java.lang.Object
aufgabe4.Noten
public final class Noten extends Object
Utility class that holds all methods needed for grades.

  • Feldübersicht

  • Methodendetails

    • istZulaessig

      public static boolean istZulaessig(String grade)
      Checks if given grade is valid or not.
      Parameter:
      grade - to check on.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if grade is valid, false if not.

    • toDouble

      public static double toDouble(String grade)
      Transforms grade into double.
      Parameter:
      grade - to transform.
      Gibt zurück:
      transformed grade.

    • toString

      public static String toString(double grade)
      Gives grade as String back. If given grade is not in between 1.0 and 5.0 throw an error.
      Parameter:
      grade - to transform.
      Gibt zurück:
      grade as string.

    • istBestanden

      public static boolean istBestanden(double grade)
      Checks if grade passed.
      Parameter:
      grade - to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      false if grade is taller than 5, else true.

    • bessere

      public static double bessere(double grade1, double grade2)
      Checks which of the two provided grades is better.
      Parameter:
      grade1 - first grade to check.
      grade2 - second grade to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      better grade.

    • schlechtere

      public static double schlechtere(double grade1, double grade2)
      Checks which of the two provided grades is worse.
      Parameter:
      grade1 - first grade to check.
      grade2 - second grade to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      worse grade.
